reviewText: I didn't realize this was a 'Bonus Material' disc, with a career review of John Inman, Mollie Sugden, Wendy Richards, and a review of British slang. No actual episodes. Next time I'll be more careful.
The dvd contains interviews with the actors. Nothing more, nothing less.
There are no actual AYBS episodes on this disc.  It's all about the actors.

The sound quality is a little annoying and low because of the way it was originally recorded on TV.
But the visual quality is great, so turn up the sound and have fun.
Lets you see the inside story with the principals of the show. Missed Captain Peacock's input on the show. Loved the video

Been trying to get this at a low price and this was it.
Good condition on this DVD and the case was fine.

Thanks for the fast service.

Roger

If you enjoy British sitcom and Humor, you
will enjoy all of the vols of "Are you
being Served".  Recommend it for all Brit
fans.

I WAS GROSSLY DISAPPOINTED TO FIND THAT THIS WAS NOT what I expected. I thought it was more wonderful episodes of the show, but it turned out to be nothing but bios of the actors. I love the actors, but that isn't what I wanted. There was nothing in the write up about it being a bio CD. Very disappointing.

I have been a fan of Are You Being Served? since I was a little kid, watching it on PBS. I'm on my way to collecting the whole set. I have to be honest and say that this one was a little pricey, so it must be the "hard-to-find" disc of the 14 piece set.

On a seperate note, for those of you that are going to purchase it, it is not actual episodes ofrom the show, it is a highlight DVD of Mollie Sugden, John Inman and Wendy Richard.
